title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 687.9 - Family Care Respite and Use of Substitute Providers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 687.9 - Family Care Respite and Use of Substitute Providers

State Regulations
A family care program substitute provider is a party approved
by a sponsoring agency to provide non-waiver respite services to individuals
receiving family care services when a family care provider is temporarily not
available to provide services. The approval and provision of these respite
services must be in accordance with the process established by
OPWDD. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
